title: Hi my pixel 2xl cameras (front & back) stopped working. Apparently it's a Dec update thing...
content: I've updated to Jan patch. Force quit, cleared cache & rebooted & like everyone else (& there seems to be A LOT of people with the same issue) it hasn't helped. Working fine one minute now useless. I use the camera a lot for work & only just "bought" the phone out at the end of it's contract. Very annoying. Any idea when a patch will be out to fix it???
